pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":["注：该镜像是 pkgsrc 源码安装的镜像。本镜像站同时提供 pkgsrc 其他功能的镜像（如二进制包，distfile 等，不包含 joyent 内容），请参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/pkgsrc/","children":"pkgsrc 镜像使用帮助"}],"。"]}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"源码安装","children":"源码安装"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对应",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.netbsd.org/docs/pkgsrc/pkgsrc.html#getting-via-cvs","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档 getting-via-cvs"}],"，本镜像站中 pkgsrc.git 镜像与官方文档中源的 CVS 架构不同，与",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/NetBSD/pkgsrc","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方 git 镜像"}],"架构类似，故使用命令有所调整。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"拉取特定稳定版镜像分支"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone -b pkgsrc-2021Q4 {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"拉取当前镜像分支"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"源码更新","children":"源码更新"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对应",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.netbsd.org/docs/pkgsrc/pkgsrc.html#uptodate-cvs","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档 uptodate-cvs"}],"，切换到 pkgsrc 目录，执行"]}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"git pull","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"源码切换分支","children":"源码切换分支"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对应",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.netbsd.org/docs/pkgsrc/pkgsrc.html#uptodate-cvs-switch","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档 uptodate-cvs-switch"}],"，切换到 pkgsrc 目录"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"切换特定稳定版镜像分支"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"git checkout pkgsrc-2021Q4","language":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"切换当前镜像分支"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"git checkout trunk","language":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: pkgsrc Git 镜像使用帮助
